channel.title: Help on commands
channel.description: need help for commands xteleall and ::God base:delta :confused:

item.title: Help on commands
item.dc:creator: @Fluffee Fluffee
item.description:
@Fluffee wrote:

[quote=“shamu308, post:11, topic:311597”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=408044.msg3013012#msg3013012 date=1256992492]
Wow, maybe you should help if you’re going to bother posting in the help section.

He doesn’t know, that’s why he POSTS IN THE HELP SECTION, do you understand that now?
[/quote]
thx guys xxlukexx i do what he tell me but al the commands he send me dont work…[/quote]

He just meant why are we spoonfeeding you. Anyway, if the commands do not work - you probably pasted them in the wrong location in client.java. Hopefully you’ll get things worked out. If you still need help - help is always provided if needed. Just remember, not everyone spoonfeeds you, so try your best to learn.

Fluffee

Read full topic

item.title: Help on commands
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

I’ll spoonfeed you again…

Step 1: Open client.java
Step 2: Press and hold CTRL + F
Step 3: In the box put code[/code] and hit search.
Step 4: Under if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); } } add if (command.startsWith("teleportall")) { if (playerRights >= 2) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client other = (client) p; other.toX = absX+Misc.random(5); other.toY = absY+Misc.random(5); other.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; other.updateRequired = true; } } else if (playerRights < 2) { sM("You must be an administrator to use this command."); } }
Step 5: Save and compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Help on commands
item.dc:creator: @Editt Editt
item.description:
@Editt wrote:

if(command.startsWith("xteleall") && playerRights >= 3){ for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client) p; // specific player's client castOn.toX = absX; // replace with your tele X coord castOn.toY = absY; // replace with your tele Y coord } } }

Read full topic
